statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE building_id = 10 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE date < '2022-01-01' AND building_id = 1;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE source_name = 'Sensor1' AND consumption_kWh > 1000;
DELETE FROM energy_sources WHERE source_type = 'Solar' AND location = 'California';
DELETE FROM insights WHERE insight_description LIKE '%error%'
DELETE FROM EnergyInsights WHERE report_id = (SELECT report_id FROM EnergyReports WHERE report_date < '2022-01-01')
